      • MathUtil

    • Method Detail

      • restrictValue

        public static double restrictValue​(double value,
                                   double min,
                                   double max)
        Restricts a value between a minimum and maximum value. If the value is greater than the maximum, it is set to maximum; if it is less than the minimum, it is set to minimum.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to check
        min - the minimum possible value
        max - the maximum possible value
        Returns:
        value, constrained between min and max

      • map

        public static double map​(double value,
                         double currentMin,
                         double currentMax,
                         double desiredMin,
                         double desiredMax)
        Maps one value in a current range to a new range.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be mapped
        currentMin - the current minimum possible value for this value
        currentMax - the current maximum possible value for this value
        desiredMin - the desired new minimum for value
        desiredMax - the desired new maximum for value
        Returns:
        value, mapped into the range between desired_min and desired_max

      • isWithin

        public static boolean isWithin​(double value,
                               double min,
                               double max)
        Determines whether a given value is within a given range, inclusive.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be checked
        min - the minimum value in the range
        max - the maximum value in the range
        Returns:
        true if the value is within the range; false otherwise
